GO_OUT_ROOM_MSG_CONECTIVE:
̃Didn't I tell you to come to Wood Park!? What are you doing there!?
ā
No more pitstops! You have to come to Wood Park! Got it!?
GO_OUT_ROOM_MSG: ̃Ahhhhh! Stop fidgeting! Not there, go further down.
AROMA_MSG_006:
̂Excellent! Looks like you've located the final ring we needed, haven't you?
ā
Alright then, it's time to unlock the final gate!
REC_POINT_11_02: ̄Compact space, comprised of millions of planets and galaxies. There is no guarantee you'll come out alive on the other side.
RUKIYA_MSG_001:
̃Oh no... this is worse than I was expecting. We don't have much time.
ā
Hurry, ȁ... I've opened the door for you to use towards the rear of the room.
AROMA_MSG_004:
̂Perfect, it looks like you've located another one of the
rings. Let me unlock the corresponding gate for you!
GO_OUT_ROOM_MSG_AROMA:
̂Hey hey hey! Quit playing around and go straight to the lab!
ā
Geez... do you really want to save Lenate?
AROMA_MSG_001:
̂Lucia's lab resides in the back. I want to show you 
something, if you could just follow me inside.
AROMA_MSG_002:
̂Through use of the Planet Seed, we should be able to rescue Lenate.
ā
To do that, we need parts called the Planet Shards, which you can get by fighting the Gods of Creation.
ā
Don't worry, though! Together, we should be able to pull this off!
ā
For now, let's head to the Centre Building and speak with the Nochoro King.
REC_POINT_01_02:
̄Attuning to this Zoom Stone will add it to your destination list.
These stones appear in various places around the world.
AROMA_MSG_003_A:
̂The gate I've unlocked should take you to challenge
the Land God, Attihocc.
ā
After this, you'll have the Sea God, Wadatsumi, and the Sky God,
Hoakari, left to defeat. Do your best, ȁ.
AROMA_MSG_003_B:
̂The gate I've unlocked should take you to challenge
the Sea God, Wadatsumi.
ā
After this, you'll have the Land God, Attihocc, and the Sky God,
Hoakari, left to defeat. Do your best, ȁ.
REC_POINT_15_02:
̄A celestial body that exists in the center of the world. 
There is no more data on it.
AROMA_MSG_003_C:
̂The gate I've unlocked should take you to challenge
the Sky God, Hoakari.
ā
After this, you'll have the Land God, Attihocc, and the Sea God,
Wadatsumi, left to defeat. Do your best, ȁ.
AROMA_MSG_005_A:
̂At the moment, I've unlocked 2 of the 3 gates leading
to the Gods of Creation.
ā
Once you've located Attihocc's Ring, I'll be able
to unlock the Land God's Gate!
AROMA_MSG_005_B:
̂At the moment, I've unlocked 2 of the 3 gates leading
to the Gods of Creation.
ā
Once you've located Wadatsumi's Ring, I'll be able
to unlock the Sea God's Gate!
AROMA_MSG_005_C:
̂At the moment, I've unlocked 2 of the 3 gates leading
to the Gods of Creation.
ā
Once you've located Hoakari's Ring, I'll be able
to unlock the Sky God's Gate!
AROMA_MSG_011: ̂All three of the Gods' gates have been unlocked. All that remains is for you to earn each God's Planet Shard.
AROMA_MSG_007:
̂Is that truly a Planet Shard?! This is amazing... even I had my doubts...
ā
This confirms my suspicions that you've grown stronger than even the original Anses!
ā
Anyhow, I'd better get to work.
ā
Let's see what happens if I put this Shard inside of the Planet Seed.
AROMA_MSG_008:
̂There are still 2 Planet Shards that remain missing. 
At this point, I have no doubts... we can do this.
ā
Well, what're you waiting for! You know it's rude to keep a lady waiting, don't you?!
AROMA_MSG_009:
̂2 Planet Shards accquired, now only
one more remains!
ā
Soon we will be able to help Renerte.
ȁ……go get em!
AROMA_MSG_010:
̂She's still inside the Core. Go on ahead of me, ȁ!
I'll meet you inside!
SYSTEM_MSG_001:
A wormhole has opened up. It appears to connect to a parallel world on the other side.
ā
Would you like to enter the wormhole?Ă
NPC_RUKIYA_REC:
̄An elderly woman who once led the Resistance.
Still a very intelligent woman, and an active leader to this day.
NPC_AROMA_REC: ̄A girl that was impersonating Lucia. She is a rather intelligent, beautiful, young apprentice scientist.
REC_POINT_NOC_02_02: ̄Stone monument that possesses a special technique obtainable by Monster Masters.
REC_POINT_NOC_03_02: ̄Stone monument that possesses a special technique obtainable by Monster Masters.
REC_POINT_NOC_04_02: ̄A stone monument that has recorded a special technology that exists for use by Monster Masters.
REC_POINT_04_02:
̄A device capable of creating a living entity out of
memories alone.
REC_POINT_05_02:
̄A very small, compact spacecraft, used for human evacuation purposes.ā
It is jam-packed with enough features and functionality to keep a human alive in space for quite some time.
REC_POINT_06_02:
̄This seed contains every element and blueprint of
life from this planet in order to begin an entirely new world.ā
However, it has not yet grown enough to achieve that.
REC_POINT_07_02: ̄A door that is sealed securely by a strong force.
REC_POINT_08_02: ̄A door that is sealed securely by a strong force.
REC_POINT_09_02: ̄A door that is sealed securely by a strong force.
REC_POINT_10_02:
̄A device used to transport humans and monsters
quickly through the fabric of space-time.
REC_POINT_12_02:
̄A ripple in space and time, leading to another world.
A frightening presence can be felt from inside.
REC_POINT_13_02:
̄A ripple in space and time, leading to another world.
A frightening presence can be felt from inside.
REC_POINT_14_02:
̄A ripple in space and time, leading to another world.
A frightening presence can be felt from inside.
AROMA_MSG_012:
̂It might be that chick's fault,
but there's no point in making a big deal of it.
ā
How about that story, though!
I wonder what the Incarnus Realm is like.
ā
Well, my pod is ruined, so i'm stuck here for a while.
Take me with you, ȁ!
TICO_MSG_001:
̂「ȁ. Come with me to the Incarnus
Realm! We need to borrow the Mirror of Ra. 
ā
With it, we can see through the distortion on this
planet and find the missing Incarnii. 
ā
However, the monsters in the Incarnus realm can
be aggressive and relentless.
ā
Above all else, we should make sure we are
prepared before we depart!
TICO_MSG_002:
̂Well then, ȁ, it's decided. Finish
your preparations, and I can open a Wormhole.
ā
You'll help me find the Incarnii, right? Are
you ready to go to the Incarnus Realm?Ă
RENATE_MSG_001:
̂As I was born from Mother, I am
bound to this planet.
ā
I'll remain here for now. Go check on the
Incarnus Realm and report back.
NPC_MAN_A:
́Judging from the condition of the pod,
Aroma must have fallen from quite the altitude.
ā
I'm glad she returned, uninjured. The safety
features of this pod are state-of-the-art.
NPC_MAN_B:
́The repairs will take a little while.
Just leave it to us!
MINE_WARP_HOLE_010:
Use the Wormhole and travel
to the Incarnus Realm?Ă
MINE_BREAK_POD_010:
The remains of the Escape Pod used by Aroma.
It is completely totaled and gives off no reaction.
NPC_TICO_REC:
̄A member of the hard working Pipit tribe who
forges lucky armaments. He is no amateur.
NPC_RENATE_REC: ̄She was once Anses's main partner. Now she's the overseer of the underground Resistance lab for Anses clones.
REC_POINT_17_02:
̄A Wormhole created by Tiko.
On the other side, the Incarnus Realm awaits.
